content.question: Based on the excerpt, Kramer would most likely support which of the following claims?

choices.label: Antislavery efforts should focus on preventing the spread of slavery to new territories.
Slavery is not a benign institution but rather assaults the spirit of enslaved people.
The unique culture of the South requires the institution of slavery.
The principles of Christianity justify the existence of slavery.

content.answer: Slavery is not a benign institution but rather assaults the spirit of enslaved people.
